title: ductal logic
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010205958/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010205958/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Ductal Logic**

Following the logic of the ductus, usually in reference to the broad-nibbed pen.

See [Ductus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010205958/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Ductus).

**Discussion:**  
 [Christian Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010205958/http:/typophile.com/node/9245?from=50&comments_per_page=50#comment-79173)
